alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 03 at 3:02AM EST until February 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...In New York, Madison, Southern Oneida, Chenango, Otsego, Broome, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chills are expected to be this evening into early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
